column4: hi ! i have a question that may be silly but please answer me: Download Net-Pcap-0.10.tar.gz from http://search.cpan.org/dist/Net-Pcap/ to /tools/wifi/deps   < how im supposed to move it to /tools/.. ?
thats a perl module .. is that really what you want
if you really want the perl module .. you can install it via.  sudo cpan Net::Pcap
